<div class="hero-title">Welcome to CINAS</div>
<div class="hero-subtitle">Connecting Algorithms, Atoms, and Health.</div>

The Research Group on Computing and AI in Nuclear and Health Sciences (CINAS) operates at the frontier of knowledge, bridging the gap between algorithmic development and critical applications in nuclear infrastructures and clinical environments.

Our mission is to develop methodologies that incorporate physical and biological domain knowledge into the architecture of intelligent models.

[Learn more about us](about.en.qmd){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button" .me-2} [Our Research](research.en.qmd){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-lg role="button"}
